description: This file defines a Pinia store for authentication in a front-end application, managing user state and authentication actions.

methods.name: initFromStorage
methods.description: Initializes authentication state from stored session or storage.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Performs login with email and password, updating user state.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user and updates user state.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the current user and clears user state.
